name: D/D Ark
effectText: If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 face-up "D/D" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, except "D/D Ark", but its effects are negated. You can only use this effect of "D/D Ark" once per turn.
pendEffect: You can target 1 Pendulum Summoned monster your opponent controls; destroy both that monster and this card. You can only use this effect of "D/D Ark" once per turn.
